origin.touhouorigins.vampire.name: Vampire
origin.touhouorigins.vampire.description: A young but powerful species of youkai, considered to be a type of devil. They possess a far broader range of abilities than most youkai.
You deal 3 more damage and move faster.
power.touhouorigins.vampire/moonlight_au: You gain night vision when exposed to the moon.
power.touhouorigins.vampire/vampirism.de: Killing living creatures heals you by 2 points and provides a short strength boost.
power.touhouorigins.vampire/scorching_su: Direct sunlight damages you unless under the effect of fire resistance.
power.touhouorigins.vampire/banes_of_the: You are greatly slowed by and take damage from flowing water, and take extra damage from fire and golden tools.
origin.touhouorigins.oni.name: Oni
origin.touhouorigins.oni.description: These ogre-like youkai possess incredible strength and power. They love to drink, feast, and compete with humans.
power.touhouorigins.oni/brawn_of_the_oni: You have 5 more hearts of health, deal 6 more damage, and are 10% taller.
power.touhouorigins.oni/drunken_stupor.d: For every negative status effect active on you, gain 3 melee damage.
power.touhouorigins.oni/heavy_drinker.de: You are sustained significantly less by food, but gain 8 hunger points when drinking any potion.
power.touhouorigins.oni/brute_force.name: Brute Force
origin.touhouorigins.fairy.name: Fairy
origin.touhouorigins.fairy.description: Fairies are small, simple, humanoid creatures of magic that represent aspects of nature. Many of them are also simple-minded.
power.touhouorigins.fairy/regeneration.d: You can rapidly heal yourself for 5 seconds.
power.touhouorigins.fairy/fluttering_win: You may float around freely by holding jump, but every second of flight consumes 1 hunger point. You may not take flight while starving.
power.touhouorigins.fairy/aspect_of_natu: You do not require food to survive.
power.touhouorigins.fairy/vegetarians_ca: You can only eat plant-based food to retain energy for flight.
power.touhouorigins.fairy/fodder.name: Fodder
power.touhouorigins.fairy/fodder.descrip: You have 4 less hearts of health and you're 25% smaller.
origin.touhouorigins.kappa.name: Kappa
origin.touhouorigins.kappa.description: Kappa are a type of youkai that live in rivers. They are technologically gifted and produce various tools with skillful hands. All kappa are extremely fond of cucumbers.
power.touhouorigins.kappa/optical_camouf: You can activate a cloaking device to become invisible for a short period of time.
power.touhouorigins.kappa/portable_craft: At any time you can deploy a 3x3 crafting interface.
power.touhouorigins.kappa/aquabatics.des: You swim faster and can hold your breath underwater for much longer.
power.touhouorigins.kappa/kappa_out_of_w: If you're out of water for too long, you will receive weakness and slowness. You are immune to weakness and slowness while submerged in water.
power.touhouorigins.kappa/soul_snatch.de: Attack someone from behind while sneaking to attempt to steal their shirikodama, dealing massive damage. This requires an empty hand and camouflage turned off. Killing your target restores some hunger points and saturation, if not undead. Whether or not the attack succeeds, this power will then go on a cooldown.
origin.touhouorigins.ghost.name: Ghost
origin.touhouorigins.ghost.description: Ghosts are the souls of humans who have remained in the physical world. Although they are souls, they have a body temperature and are fully corporeal.
Your ghost form grants you immunity to poison and nausea.
power.touhouorigins.ghost/fading_body.de: You have 5 less hearts, but regenerate health very quickly.
power.touhouorigins.ghost/withering_soul: Standing on soul blocks prevents you from regenerating and will slowly wither away your spirit, unless wearing boots enchanted with soul speed.
origin.touhouorigins.vengeful_spirit.des: A vengeful spirit is a type of ghost created under special circumstances. They often seek revenge for unjust deeds done to them.
power.touhouorigins.vengeful_spirit/veng: Killing a mob or another player grants you a stack. Once you have at least 5 stacks, you can activate this power to regenerate health. You can store up to 3 heals.
power.touhouorigins.vengeful_spirit/sear: The lower your health is, the more melee damage you deal. Opponents that strike you with melee will occasionally take fire damage.
origin.touhouorigins.crow_tengu.name: Crow Tengu
origin.touhouorigins.crow_tengu.descript: A tengu is a form of youkai common in Japanese mythology. The crow tengu are similar to anthropomorphic crows with a humanoid body structure.
power.touhouorigins.crow_tengu/gust_of_w: You can unleash the power of the wind to launch yourself in the direction you're looking.
power.touhouorigins.crow_tengu/youkai_of: You have elytra flight without needing to equip any elytra.
power.touhouorigins.crow_tengu/flight_fr: You have 3 less hearts of health and cannot wear heavy armor.
power.touhouorigins.crow_tengu/reporting: All of your damage is cut in half.
origin.touhouorigins.wolf_tengu.name: Wolf Tengu
origin.touhouorigins.wolf_tengu.descript: White Wolf Tengu are the "mountain's defense force", responsible for keeping out intruders.
power.touhouorigins.wolf_tengu/warrior_s: You can activate this power to gain Strength III for 10 seconds.
power.touhouorigins.wolf_tengu/mountaino: All swords swing 30% slower, but your reach when using them is increased by 1 block.
power.touhouorigins.wolf_tengu/clumsy_ar: You are less accurate with a bow.
origin.touhouorigins.earth_rabbit.name: Earth Rabbit
origin.touhouorigins.earth_rabbit.descri: A rabbit can become a type of youkai after existing for a long period of time, gaining sentience and increased abilities in the process.
power.touhouorigins.earth_rabbit/great_f: Players near you are given Luck V.
power.touhouorigins.earth_rabbit/misfort: Your attackers are inflicted with Bad Luck X, or Bad Luck L if you are killed instead.
power.touhouorigins.earth_rabbit/feeble_: You have 3 less hearts of health and you're 15% smaller.
origin.touhouorigins.moon_rabbit.name: Moon Rabbit
origin.touhouorigins.moon_rabbit.descrip: Tools used by the Lunarians who have fled from their previous lives in search of greener pastures. They take with them their training and skills, but always live in fear of being found out and taken back to the lunar surface.
power.touhouorigins.moon_rabbit/military: You start with a crossbow and a handful of arrows. You can activate this power to rapidly reload your crossbow. This only works with regular arrows.
power.touhouorigins.moon_rabbit/timid_co: You have 2 less hearts of health. Melee weapons such as axes, swords, and tridents swing 40% slower.
origin.touhouorigins.magician.name: Magician
origin.touhouorigins.magician.descriptio: While highly skilled in magic, a magician youkai's body is essentially human, and they do not possess the enhanced physical strength and durability of most youkai. In fact many magician youkai are frail even by human standards.
power.touhouorigins.common/mana.name: Mana
power.touhouorigins.common/mana.descript: You use mana to cast spells, which has a unique meter that regenerates over time. You also cannot starve.
power.touhouorigins.magician/spells.name: Spellcasting
power.touhouorigins.magician/spells.desc: You have two basic spells: one for attacking and one for healing.
power.touhouorigins.magician/spellswitch: You can cycle through your spell list.
power.touhouorigins.magician/weak_body.d: As a magician, your physical attributes are weaker. However, you gain xp slightly faster and are immune to poison.
power.touhouorigins.common/apparition_ap: You do not require food to stay alive.
power.touhouorigins.common/futile_concoc: You are unable to drink potions.
power.touhouorigins.common/tengu_speed.d: You are naturally faster than a regular person.
You have an increased luck attribute.
power.touhouorigins.common/strong_legs.d: You are capable of jumping higher while sneaking, and running longer than a regular person. You take slightly less fall damage.
